column5: We are planning a special trip for June 2013. Does anyone have any experience with Tetu Island Lodge in Ontario? We have been to Halley's Kettle Falls nearby. Any comments would be most helpful. Price is steep and don't mind paying it if the experience is extra special.
First class all the way including the fishing. One of the best places in the area second to none.
Pretty hard to beat Halley's Kettle Falls in my opinion
Looks like a really classy place, but the recommended $25-30 per person per day tipping suggestion scares me
Ed at Tetu runs an amazing resort. Beautiful and top notch... you'll love it.
